downloads.adsbox.thankyou.message.description: Message of the advertisement section box.
downloads.adsbox.thankyou.message.message: Advertenties helpen ons team en zorgen ervoor dat onze servers soepel blijven draaien, zodat jij de beste gebruikerservaring krijgt!

downloads.adsbox.thankyou.title.description: Title of the advertisement section box.

downloads.button.back.description: Back button on the ads section

downloads.button.cancel.description: Button on the modal of Opera/Edge browsers.

downloads.button.done.description: Button on the page when trying to download with adblocker on.

downloads.button.login.description: Login button on the downloads page.

downloads.button.okay.description: Button on the modal of Opera/Edge browsers.

downloads.button.skip.description: Skip button on the ads section

downloads.button.skipanyway.description: Skip Anyway button on the ads page.

downloads.error.login.description: Error message if the user is not logged in.
downloads.error.login.message: Log in om de downloads te kunnen zien.

downloads.error.noaccess.description.description: More info if the user doesn't alpha/beta access.
downloads.error.noaccess.description.message: Je kunt **hier** gratis deelnemen aan ons bètaprogramma. Wees snel! Er zijn nog maar {0} plaatsen beschikbaar

downloads.error.noaccess.title.description: Error message if the user doesn't alpha/beta access.
downloads.error.noaccess.title.message: Oh jee, het lijkt erop dat je geen toegang hebt tot de alpha of bèta :(

downloads.header.subtitle.message: Gebruik PreMiD nu en laat aan je vrienden zien wat je aan het doen bent, misschien vind je iemand met dezelfde interesses.

downloads.instructions.footer.link.message: We zijn er om je te helpen!

downloads.instructions.heading.description: Displayed at Downloads page above steps

downloads.instructions.step_3.message: Voeg onze extensie toe aan je browser

downloads.instructions.step_4.description: I think you get what this is...
downloads.instructions.step_4.message: Herlaad deze site en controleer of de extensie is verbonden

downloads.mobile.errorMessage.description: Downloads page warning when user is on mobile.
downloads.mobile.errorMessage.message: Wees er alstublieft van bewust dat PreMiD niet wordt ondersteund op mobiele apparaten.

downloads.showbeta.small.description: Small text under the show beta title.
downloads.showbeta.small.message: (niet nodig als je hier bent om de normale applicatie te downloaden)

downloads.skipanyway.message1.description: Skip anyway messages (changes everytime you click it).

downloads.skipanyway.message2.description: Skip anyway messages (changes everytime you click it).

downloads.skipanyway.message3.description: Skip anyway messages (changes everytime you click it).

downloads.skipanyway.message4.description: Skip anyway messages (changes everytime you click it).

downloads.skipanyway.message5.description: Skip anyway messages (changes everytime you click it).

downloads.skipanyway.message6.description: Last message of the skip anyway messages (changes everytime you click it).

downloads.tooltips.os_not_supported.part.description: Next part of the tooltip message. {0} are replaced with `downloads.tooltips.os_not_supported.part1`
downloads.tooltips.os_not_supported.part.message: {0} Er is geen installatieprogramma voor dit besturingssysteem. Dit betekent dat er geen professionele ondersteuning voor is.

downloads.warning.differentVersion.description: Tippy message of the Linux card.
downloads.warning.differentVersion.message: Huidige versie van dit platform is {0} (deze versie is specifiek voor Linux en is niet van toepassing op andere platformen).

downloads.warning.differentVersion2.description: Tippy message of the version number when user is on Linux.
downloads.warning.differentVersion2.message: Deze versie is specifiek voor Linux en is niet van toepassing op andere systemen. De hoofdversie van de applicatie is {0}

downloads.warning.message.opera.description: Warning modal message when an Opera user clicks on Opera (extension) download. '**this**' will be replaced with link to the Opera's extension store. Keep the *.
downloads.warning.message.opera.message: Je moet **deze** extensie ook installeren voor je PreMiD kunt installeren via de Chrome Webstore.

downloads.warning.title.description: Warning modal title, pops out when user clicks on Edge/Opera downloads (based on the current browser).

downloads.mobile.notAvailable.description: Warning message shown on mobile devices indicating PreMiD is not available.
downloads.mobile.notAvailable.message: PreMiD is niet beschikbaar voor mobiele apparaten. Gebruik een desktop browser om PreMiD te installeren.

downloads.mobile.showDownloads.description: Button text to show downloads section on mobile.

downloads.mobile.hideDownloads.description: Button text to hide downloads section on mobile.

downloads.notice.header.title.description: Main announcement title in the downloads page.

downloads.notice.header.removal.description: First line of the announcement about app removal.
downloads.notice.header.removal.message: We hebben de applicatie volledig verwijderd!

downloads.notice.header.simplified.description: Second line explaining the simplified installation process.
downloads.notice.header.simplified.message: Nu heb je alleen de browserextensie nodig, geen extra downloads nodig.

downloads.notice.features.noApp.description: Feature tag highlighting no app requirement.

downloads.notice.version.description: Small text showing version information and reason for change.
downloads.notice.version.message: Applicatie verwijderd in v2.6.0 om je leven gemakkelijker te maken ✨

downloads.notice.browsers.title.description: Title for the browser selection section.

downloads.notice.browsers.comingSoon.description: Label shown on unavailable browser options.

downloads.notice.beta.title.description: Title for the beta program section.

downloads.notice.beta.description.description: Description of how to join the beta program.
downloads.notice.beta.description.message: Vind je het leuk om nieuwe dingen te proberen? Sluit je aan bij onze Discord en gebruik /beta om vervroegt toegang te krijgen!

downloads.notice.alpha.title.description: Title for the alpha access section.

downloads.notice.alpha.description.description: Description of how to get alpha access.
downloads.notice.alpha.description.message: Ondersteun ons op GitHub of Patreon om de functies te krijgen!

downloads.notice.support.needHelp.description: Start of the support section text.
downloads.notice.support.needHelp.message: Hulp nodig? Word lid van onze

downloads.notice.support.discord.description: Discord link text in support section.

downloads.notice.support.forSupport.description: End of the support section text.

downloads.notice.appreciation.descriptio.message: Overweeg ons te steunen of een beoordeling achter te laten, het betekent de wereld voor ons!
